existing_features.title: Remove the separate "Strategy Session" navigation link so users are not presented with a standalone menu entry for the Strategy Session page.

Change the "Book Strategy Call" button behavior (site-wide) to open the internal Strategy Session page route ("/strategy-session") using the existing client-side routing pattern (history.pushState + popstate dispatch), so the Strategy Session page opens from the button on all pages.

new_feature_requests.summary: Remove separate Strategy Session link; ensure all pages use a 'Book Strategy Call' button that opens the booking page

projectName: Remove separate Strategy Session nav link and open Strategy Session page from Book Strategy Call CTA
